response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe is an excellent match for your needs and expectations. This product is truly exceptional and offers unparalleled value, just like your business does. I understand its significance to you, valued at $12,000. To ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I propose a special introductory offer of $10,800 for you today. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a high-quality product at a highly competitive price. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of enhancing your operations with our product.", "product_price": 10800}
